data.title: Smokable Hemp Brand Dad Grass Drops New George Harrison Line
data.meta_description: It's the first official cannabis collaboration for any member of The Beatles.
data.text:
And according to anyone who followed The Beatles during the psychedelic era and beyond, Harrison also had a certain well-documented fondness for weed.

Bringing those two passions together, a cannabis player called Dad Grass has collaborated with the Harrison estate for a co-branded collection of pre-rolled hemp joints (a mix of CBD and CBG, with traces of THC), smoking paraphernalia and merchandise.

The products launch this week under the banner All Things Must Grass, a purposely corny riff on Harrisonâ€™s seminal 1970 album All Things Must Pass, which recently won a Grammy for its 50th anniversary re-issue.
